aws.description: Install a set of library to use the face and scene rekognition on Amazon web services

helper.description: A lot of function nice to have as a helper to use easily in the view and wherever you need
helper.post-install: Open you Providers/AppServiceProvider.php and add 'include __DIR__.'/../Libraries/Helper/famous.php';' in the register() method

httpcommunicator.description: It's an helper for Guzzle providing basic method for RESTfull calls.

dropbox.post-install: This require to install also the httpcommunicator if not done yet

auth.description: A set of file to implement a custom and managable authentification system
auth.post-install: Read the README in the Auth directory. A lot of files need to be moved

Image-resizer.post-install: The function in helper.php can be moved in the helper directory. Or you can use it as the helper file and so open you Providers/AppServiceProvider.php and add 'include __DIR__.'/../Libraries/Image/helper.php';' in the register() method

Ogone.description: Template for an ogone library with route, controller and lib
Ogone.post-install: Copy the route in your route file, move the controller at the right place and set the env variable
